TEXT.TITLE: EGYPT SAID TO CANCEL PL480 SOFT WHEAT TENDER
TEXT.BODY: Egypt has cancelled its Export Bonus tender for 200,000 tonnes of soft red winter wheat for May-June shipment after failing to bid a price acceptable to USDA, private export sources said. Reuter
